website_summaries.verdict: Good-size hot dog toaster that can cook up to 4 dogs and 4 buns at a time. Great for fast dinners and lunches for the family.
pros: Not just a fun novelty appliance, it offers up tasty dogs and buns in a flash
Easy to use and easy to clean
Comes with removable cage, mini tongs, and drip tray
Attractive enough to leave out, or it can be stored away easily in a cupboard
Good for hot dog lovers who don’t like or know how to cook
cons: Homemade or bakery buns won't fit
Parts of the bun may blacken if it touches inside metal walls of toaster

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to recommend this product - unfortunately, it's faulty and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this product - BUT I'm giving it 1 star because it is doesn't work properly and nearly set my grandparents' house on fire. I purchased this two years ago and just found out today that apparently this product actually broke after it caught ON FIRE during it's THIRD use. My grandparents have been keeping it in their kitchen all this time because they like the way it looks, and were hoping to exchange it. Not sure if this product was just faulty - but to any potential buyers out there, I would steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Miller

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your Money
customer_reviews.text: Bad Bad Bad I bought this as a gift I don't Normally write reviews but I have to write one on this Hoping it will help others not to waste there money. It is pretty that is about all that is good about it . It does not Toast the buns it burns the edges that is if you can get them out They stick inside the bun part and you have to tear them apart to get them out I am being nice giving it 1 star WHAT A WASTE OF MY MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette

customer_reviews.title: Good for hot dogs, not for buns
customer_reviews.text: My man LOVED this, but in real use, we have to set the hot dogs through two cycles to get cooked enough. And we've tried to toast buns in the bun part, but they stick to the sides and burn, so we don't do THAT anymore. So now we have a huge appliance that cooks only hot dogs, and we still have to do buns in the toaster oven (which we were hoping to get rid of with this purchase). Cute idea, but reality isn't so lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Wife hates it, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Wife says this is a big waist of money, I disagree, it roasts the hot do instead of boiling it so the flavor is way better. Easy to clean. Takes a few times to get the settings right so you have to experiment with it yourself as some buns are different than others and some hot dogs are different than others. I cook my hot dogs once first, flip over then cook again this time with the buns. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gunnels

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: sent back, was worried that it may be to hard for the kids to operate because you would have to use different controls till you get it right for buns and hot dogs
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, cooks so so.
customer_reviews.text: You have to start the dogs first on 5 then reset dogs and buns together on 4 or less. Not impressed with this other than looks. First time gets buns burnt on the part you slide the buns in. So very hard to clean that. The dogs are ok but the buns aren’t very good. Would not buy again nor recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta G Greany

customer_reviews.title: Operates great but it is the hot dog buns that create ...
customer_reviews.text: So we have 2 of the single hot dog toasters for work-toast hot dogs well but the main issue is fitting the buns into the toaster. Most bun are a little large and create problem getting them in and out when toasted. We bought the large version for when the grand kids come over but I know we will have same problem. Operates great but it is the hot dog buns that create problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Quimby

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: After using this several times, I have changed my rating and review. The toasted buns are actually REALLY good! It cooks the hotdogs perfectly, along with the buns. MUCH better than microwave, or boiling (and no cleanup)! Try it out, you will be surprised! I was!
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT White Elephant Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a white elephant party mainly because I thought it’d get some laughs. It did, but people absolutely were fighting over it! My co-worker who won it has been loving it for her kids. And... it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: B.Mc

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR REGULAR HOT DOGS
customer_reviews.text: FORGET WHAT THE BOX SAYS, THIS UNIT DOES NOT ACCEPT - (SAUSAGES, BRATS & STYLE HOT DOGS THAT PLUMPS-UP AS IT COOK) THIS UNIT IS GREAT FOR REGULAR ( THIN) HOT DOGS ONLY.
customer_reviews.author: avery jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed so far...
customer_reviews.text: First things first, my product was returned and resold to me, you open the box and see that it's been repackaged with no paperwork or instructions to be found. Using it will take trial and error because all I got was uncooked hot dogs and buns with burnt edges with my initial toasting.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and Adjustable time cooking
customer_reviews.text: My family loves quality hot dogs. This 4 dog toaster is a bit tight fit for our local packing plant dogs but we use it anyway. Cooking and toasting time can be regulated so if some like a bit of black on their dog, it can be done.
customer_reviews.author: b21cross

customer_reviews.title: this is just too cool
customer_reviews.text: AFTER EATING HOT DOGS ALL MY LIFE, I THOUGHT THIS WOULD BE A JOKE. THERE IS SOMETHING COOL ABOUT THIS TOASTER. THE CHAR ON THE BUNS, THE CRISPNESS OF THE WIENER ,OR JUST THE FACT IT IS A TOASTER. MY SON AND I LOVE SITTING AT THE TABLE TALKING AND EATING HOT DOGS FROM THIS THING. IT IS MONEY WELL SPENT.
customer_reviews.author: harry m.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother purchasing this item. Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his birthday. He loves getting hot dogs from gas stations when we travel. I was very disappointed with this item. You can't use fat hot dogs as they don't cook enough, plus a lot of hot dog's are too long and will leave about 1 inch uncooked. Forget about using the bun warmer. It just burns them
customer_reviews.author: mich

customer_reviews.title: The machine does not do a good job on cooking the hot dogs
customer_reviews.text: I found when using this device that the hot dogs did not cook well, and sometimes had to be cooked a second time (w/o the buns) in order to be acceptable. If the hot dogs had been in the refrigerator and were cold and not allowed to sit out first to come up to room temperature before cooking it was even worse. The hot dogs racks and bun racks both also occasionally jammed in the lower cooking position once they were warmed by operation and would not eject.
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Samulka

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for quick hot dogs and love that it does 4 at a time. I had the other one that does 2 but like this one better because you can do 4 at a time. Wish though it browned the buns better with like grill marks or a flat plate against the inside to brown like a grilled cheese but does the sides and makes them a little burnt, but i like it a little crisp. Its really a cute appliance to add to your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: jane h.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky eater who “sometimes” eats hotdogs and I thought this would motivate him to eat them more often. While that didn’t work, our family loves it! Drop the buns in after the hotdogs have been in a while or they will get too toasted. Such a great way for everyone to have a hot juicy hotdog without grilling!
customer_reviews.author: Josette

customer_reviews.title: Get Your Hot Dogs Here!
customer_reviews.text: We burnt out our 19yr old 2 slot Hot Dog Dippity when they first came out. Went to the 4 dog Toaster this time. Kid and adult LOL! friendly user. In a few minutes you have tasty Hot Dogs with that grill flavor.
customer_reviews.author: John Cox

customer_reviews.title: Buns get stuck and burnt.
customer_reviews.text: The description included something about only using normal size hotdog buns, otherwise the buns will get stuck. No hotdog buns work. I tried 4 different types / all were “normal size” and all got stuck inside. Hot dogs cook fine. Those have to be the normal size which still stick out a little. I would cook them 2x. Once with one side down, then flip them and cook again w the other side down.
customer_reviews.author: brittany lee

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although this item looks nice and its been three months it is now in the trash. Stopped working after about the 4th package of hot dogs. After the first package it was increasingly hard to keep the handle in the down position - it kept popping up and now it no longer works. Do not recommend this item at all ......
customer_reviews.author: Bill Buckley

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money it will go out in my trash
customer_reviews.text: this machine is awful bought it and tried it once cannot cook the hot dogs and the buns at the same time the buns stick to the machine and the dogs never cook proper half cooked and half just warm. A waste of money it will go out in my trash. A lesson learned..
customer_reviews.author: VIVIAN LINDAUER

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It does exactly what it says it does...the bonus for me was the bun toaster. It just made the hotdogs taste that much better. I did have to put the hot dogs through twice because I like a really charred hot dog, but overall, I am pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeccah

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: Roaster looks and feels quite retro, though I had never seen or heard of a wienie roaster before. The item is solid and easy to operate. The little lady loves being able to pop in a dog any time she desires, and once the proper temp is found, the dogs come out mustard and condiment ready.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Raffle Prize - delivery awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a raffle prize and I'm sure it will be a great hit! But I just wanted to give kudos to the delivery folks who went out of their way to hide the package behind the cement structure on my front porch. Amazon delivery was super awesome sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Workaholic Diva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Wide slots, cancel button, incrimental time adjustments on both sides, 3 different buttons for thawing, bagels, toast, ect. Great color.
customer_reviews.author: M. Selep

customer_reviews.title: Fun, especially for hungry kuds.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved it. It also was a hit with young nephews. As others have stated depending on how you like your dogs? 5 minutes is a minimum. If you leave your buns 5 minutes it will be burned. Once you learn your preferences? It's a great little item to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeyshines

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cook the dogs and burns the buns
customer_reviews.text: It burns the buns and does not cook the hot dogs all the way. My husband was excited to get it, but very disappointed with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Crosbie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but make sure all the parts my kids opened and used it and it was missing an insert for the weiners. I can’t return because it was used already but great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashante Warren

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this device. Easy to toast a couple hot dogs and buns. Taste better than microwaved dogs to me plus I really like the toasted hot dog buns.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really cook them as done as I like. Hot dogs stick out so you have to flip recook, cafe for buns are small. It’s okay. I think I was more thrilled with the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves this. Only down side really is that certain buns you really have to shove in to get them to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work.
customer_reviews.text: This will toast the buns but not cook the hot dogs through. Still have to use a microwave or boiled water to finish cooking it. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Parks

customer_reviews.title: Burns Buns!
customer_reviews.text: Cute to have but a pain to use. I've not found any hotdog bun that will fit in it without burning. There's no way to clean off the burnt bun residue.
customer_reviews.author: "secondhandrosee"

customer_reviews.title: It's nice looking but I have to toast and re toast ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking but I have to toast and re toast regular hot dogs about 3 times to get it to properly heat it up. It's literally a toaster with holes in it to accommodate the hot dogs. No special taste to it or magic.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: The toaster was fun!
customer_reviews.text: The hot dog toaster worked pretty well and was a fun purchase. We were very satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Hotdog toaster
customer_reviews.text: So awesome and easier than the grill and taste is better than boiling
customer_reviews.author: Sandra quinn

customer_reviews.title: All around good product......
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen gadget easy clean & fast cooking hot dogs....
customer_reviews.author: Richard F.

customer_reviews.title: Almost instant hot dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever we don't feel like cooking, I whip out the Hot Dog cooker. Fastest "Dog" in town!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherlock Ohms

customer_reviews.title: We love it, works great when ever we want a ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it, works great when ever we want a hot dog without having get out pots or pans to cook one and it even toast the buns
customer_reviews.author: James G. Peri Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it! My only feed back would be that I wished the bread slots were a tad bigger, it was a snug fit for our standard hot dog buns.
customer_reviews.author: A.Mac

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. The hot dogs weren't hot and the buns get charred. One needs two cycles to get the hot dogs hot, just barely, and the buns become over toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a two dog one that I bring to job sites and wanted 4 dog one for house
customer_reviews.author: Jason Morgan

customer_reviews.title: yes
customer_reviews.text: great for making a lot of dogs at once, but do NOT put the fat ones in or you will have to dig them out
customer_reviews.author: Love Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a white elephant gift and the recipient was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday. It was a big hit. I'd totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Talisa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of crap! Burns the buns and dogs are cold. Or the bun gets stuck in the toaster and gets tore apart when you try get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: We are not big Hot Dog fans but this is a fun way to have them once in awhile! We actually liked it so much we bought a second one, the smaller one for my Grandfather for his birthday! My kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: KWood

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.  Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. We live in assisted living &, this is perfect when we feel like having a hot dog in our apt.
customer_reviews.author: Cattylady

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my Secret Santa and he likes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Secret Santa and he likes it. He said the gun isnsuper cripsy when it’s cooked and it’s less than 5mins and I get s hotdog..I’m thinking of buying this for myself
customer_reviews.author: Nhung Tran

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: We use it at our legion and it is quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: OEFsoldier04

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Works well, would be nice if it was heavier construction. Will have to see if it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cool and quirky
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gag gift turns out it works great
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dowe

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gag gift for my father but he actually uses it and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Tighe

customer_reviews.title: perfect for worl
customer_reviews.text: I had a 2 hogdog cooker bamb step it up got a 4 cooker awesome for quick dogs and even better at work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana hatch

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My husband's new favorite kitchen appliance. Now I can rest easy knowing he eats dinner when I work evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Regular hot dogs and buns work great.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read mixed feelings about this device but honestly it does the job it was made for. Regular hot dogs and buns work great.
customer_reviews.author: JasonVM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t toast the hotdogs or the buns fully. They weren’t cold but they weren’t really toasted either.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It's a waste of MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it because it burns the buns, and the hot dogs are not hot enough...
customer_reviews.author: Pernell Vinnett

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use, and they come out great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Valentines gift for my husband and son. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love this !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd one of these, we can not live with out it!!!when we cook outs the kids want the hot dogs made in this and NOT on the grill. Win win!!!we can make everyone happy!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Mathews

customer_reviews.title: thank you for great product and fast
customer_reviews.text: omg my mom loves this she can make a hot dog for her self with no mess ... thank you for great product and fast service
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Hotdogs
customer_reviews.text: My kids wanted this so bad. It is perfect for them to use. The price was amazing too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Hot Dog Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is easy to use and clean and most importantly the hot dogs are grilled/toasted and taste delicious! Buns toast at the same time best purchase yet! 4 at a time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M Lombrana

customer_reviews.title: Returned the item
customer_reviews.text: Returned the item; for me the hot dog didn’t cook sufficiently and the bun didn’t quite fit.
customer_reviews.author: Vieques one

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Mrs. Clause!!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding? I love hot dogs. Now they are convenient. This was my favorite Christmas present!!! Thank you Mrs. Clause
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Galaska

customer_reviews.title: There is a trial period to figure out how you like your hot dog
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! There is a trial period to figure out how you like your hot dog . He hasn't used it to heat up buns yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Toaster fun
customer_reviews.text: I really like the easy of using this nostalgic hotdog toaster to the point where I bought my daughter one. Not to mention it's fun also.😊 I have had zero trouble out of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product good value for the money thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Quick and convenient for a good hot.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my kitchen at the office so people could have a quick and easy snack. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun on a Friday with our staff
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our breakroom at work...Lots of fun on a Friday with our staff...works great!

customer_reviews.text: Awesome my husband loves this machine. He makes his own dogs

customer_reviews.text: Its handy as all heck,when we just want a quick snack four quick hotdogs does the trick with toasted buns oh yeah

customer_reviews.text: I do not like the product. Wish I could return it used it twice and it’s not good.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: can't get that really hot well toasted hotdog out of this

customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and cheap. But built cheaply as well and really only suitable for thin franks.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my Dad he loves this! Couldnt wait to test it out!

customer_reviews.title: Hot dogs are yummy
customer_reviews.text: My FIL used this twice a week and loves it!

customer_reviews.title: A Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit from the start! Who knew how many times a person wants to make hot dogs!! hahah This will definitely be an on-the-counter appliance!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Blackington

customer_reviews.title: Very retro and cool- easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very retro and cool- easy to use. Was a hit at our gift exchange at Christmas

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: great machine we must have cooked 40 dogs with it all perfect

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly as it was advertised. We use it frequently.

customer_reviews.text: works well but could toast the buns a little better
customer_reviews.author: Barb Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome idea. I love it. It gives hot dogs whole new meaning!!
customer_reviews.author: gousnavy

customer_reviews.title: Hot dogs are yummy
customer_reviews.text: Works great !! Use it at least twice a week
customer_reviews.author: kelly dunn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my father in-law...he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marvin

customer_reviews.title: I've really enjoyed this toaster since I got it
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed this toaster since I got it. It takes up a good amount of counter space, but the color happens to match the scheme I've got going in my kitchen. I'm vegan and use Lightlife Smart Dogs exclusively. I've used both the regular and jumbo size dogs and it works pretty darn okay at max setting. The large dogs might be a tad cold in the middle, but I'm not picky with my fake meats I guess. The regular sizes work just fine. The four slots means I can whip out a family meal in minutes. Pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when its done cooking and pops back up.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when its done cooking and pops up, sometines it pops too hard that it almost throws the hotdogs out of it...its weird but otherwise it works fine and we enjoy having it.
customer_reviews.author: Noha H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, product and price were right.
customer_reviews.text: Real nice piece of equipment. Works exactly as advertised. my girl just loves it.....lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kenster

customer_reviews.title: Novelty product
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but this is a Novelty product at best. Hot dogs don't cook at the same speed as the bread. I have to cook the hot dogs twice at the highest heat setting (5) and then cook the buns at med- low (2) for 3 minutes. Not too difficult, but you can't just throw them all in at once and get a good result.
customer_reviews.author: Jackflash20

customer_reviews.title: It has earned its spot on the kitchen counter!
customer_reviews.text: My husband saw this on day and had to have it. He and our boys loved it so much we bought two more as unique Christmas gift ideas.. they were a pretty big hit! In all, it's an excellent appliance to have on hand for a quick lunch or even dinner one night. We've used it so much it has earned a spot on the kitchen counter. I'm not a big fan of hot dogs, but it even toasts the buns... so that's a win in my book!! It's great quality and the dogs/buns come out perfect. -The Wife
customer_reviews.author: JasonKim Lebeda

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and really is well made. It does such a good job cooking the buns and dogs. We run the dogs through twice on setting 4 and when we start the second round of cooking we put the buns in.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bjornson

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with our Four Pop-Up Hot Dog Toaster
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our Four Pop-Up Hot Dog Toaster. As soon as the box was delivered, we opened it, and began to toast hotdogs. The hotdogs were toasted perfectly. We will next be toasting the hotdog buns, along with our hotdogs. We used to steam our hotdogs, but ever since we've toasted our hotdogs, we may just toast them from now on!
customer_reviews.author: David Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make Hot Dogs quick and easy.
customer_reviews.text: I love Hot Dogs, but not in the microwave. This makes them so easy, but here is tip one. Start the hot dogs first and once they are starting to warm then put the buns in the slots. This way the hot dogs get hot and the buns don't burn. Tip 2, if using bun length hot dogs, flip them over when you add the buns. They are just a bit long for the toaster. Easy to take the hot dogs racks out and put them in the dishwasher to clean. And I love the old fashion look. I would recommend it for someone who loves hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: We have now used this product about a dozen times in the last few weeks. Every time the bun edges are burned and the hot dog is barely done. We have finally stopped cooking the BUNS and turned the setting to the highest to get the hot dogs even close to done. They appear done, but are cool in the centers. If it were not for Covid19 I would return it but to me that is not the right thing to do in this environment so we will just probably not use it.
customer_reviews.author: AFurguson

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Use
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this hot dog cooker. It looks beautiful in our kitchen. I read many of the reviews and was prepared for some issues such as the brief smoking. Even though the toasted buns are delicious, parts of them burn. And the hot dogs (we use vegi-dogs) do not get fully toasted. But they are still tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t like hotdogs?!??
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift for college students!! Wedding showers! Baby showers! Graduation! Who doesn’t like hotdogs?!?? This makes awesome, fast hotdogs so tasty!!! Why this instead of the microwave? This makes it so you can crisp the skins and toasts the buns!! It turns a 5 minute afterthought of a meal into something truly delicious!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Layne Smith

customer_reviews.title: One minor problem...
customer_reviews.text: Isn't it cool looking? And it does cook wieners very good, clever retro design. But, about one out of every 4-5 times you use it, it will burn the edges of the buns. No matter how carefully you insert them, this does happen. I still like it, but they need to fix that problem. Also, kind of a chore to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gil in San Antonio

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband eats hot dogs all the time, and he can tell you this is a huge time saver and the hot dogs come out evenly cooked and certainly taste better than boiled hot dogs. (Ewwww). He doesn't get excited about many gifts, but he used it the first chance he got. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: eternity107

product_meta.title: Nostalgia RHDT800RETRORED Pop-Up 4 Hot Dog and Bun Toaster With Mini Tongs, Works With Chicken, Turkey, Veggie Sausages and Brats, Retro Red
product_meta.description: Color:Retro RedKeep things quick and easy while prepairing a meal everyone loves. The large hot dog cage fits two regular size or extra plump hot dogs. Adjust the heat setting to cook hot dogs to your preference. Easily remove the hot dog cage and use the included mini tongs for removing the hot dogs.
feature_bullets: Great tasting hot dogs: Toasts up to 4 delicious, regular size or extra plump hot dogs and 4 buns at the same time
Adjustable settings: Adjustable toasting timer and stop toasting button allows you to toast your hot dogs to your preferred doneness
Hot dog cage & tongs: Keep hands safe when removing hot dogs by using the included hot dog cage and mini tongs
Drip tray: Slide out the drip tray when done toasting for easy cleaning
Cord wrap: Wrap the appliance cord underneath the base of the unit for tidy storage
Works with other dogs: Also works with pre cooked chicken dogs, turkey dogs, veggie dogs, sausages and brats
